title: Will Super Galaxy Rumble get his own icon?
body:
Noticing the new set of icons for the newer Super Galaxy champion skins - I was wondering if the original Super Galaxy Rumble can get his own summoner icon as well? He never received a ward skin or icon at his release and it would be epic to have a little more Rumble love with a nice icon of him. Just a trivial thing - but was wondering if this could be possible in the future.

Final Boss Veigar got his staff added as an icon when Arcade Riven and Battleboss Blitzcrank were added despite having released over a year ago. Can SG Rumble get his own summoner icon as well likewise? {{champion:68}}

replies.body: We don't have plans to create a SG Rumble icon. Sorry!

That's fine, just was a question of curiosity.

Thank you very much for the reply! ^_^
No worries. :) Always glad to reply where I can!

Any chance you'd revisit the older skins to give them summoner icons in the future? (like 1~2 years time?)

I want that SG Rumble icon so bad too! D:
It's certainty possible! It's not something we're 100& against.

Custom icons are meant for ultimate skins, Rumble's just legendary. Unless Riot wants to change that somehow...

Unless you mean a summoner icon, in that case, sorry for the confusion.

Oh no, I meant a summoner icon. I apologize about the lack of clarity there.

I understand the issue about icons representing the champions in game - just meant for the summoner icons.
Well, Rumble mains would apreciate it if so. But unsure if Riot would do it.

It would indeed be quite gracious to get a summoner icon for a skin that was released nearly two years ago - though since FB Veigar got this treatment last year, I think a SG Rumble summoner icon would be fitting as well. He certainly looks very stylized in that skin so hopefully it can happen!
Probably not, it's like how Yasuo really got nothing out of the Project skins having their icons.

That's true as well. Though SG Rumble is a legendary skin in comparison to Project Yasuo...you have a point there.

Ah well, it's worth a try to see if Riot might see this.
PLZ create SG Rumble ICON!!!!! PLZ wont take long.
